;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.25

    Affects Sailor  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 1.5

    Affects Landlubber  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiralinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and FactionType slave

    Affects FamousPirate  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiralinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and FactionType slave
          and Trait FamousPirate >= 1

    Affects FamousPirate  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiralinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and FactionType slave
          and Trait FamousPirate >= 2

    Affects FamousPirate  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 50000
          and not FactionType egypt
	  and not FactionType mongols
          and not Trait Aragorn > 0
          and not Trait Gandalf > 0
          and not Trait Legolas > 0
          and not Trait Aragorn2 > 0
          and not Trait Elessar > 0
          and not Trait Faramir > 0
          and not Trait Thengel > 0
          and not Trait Theoden > 0
          and not Trait Witchking > 0
          and not Trait Nazgul > 0
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not Trait Ugluk > 0
          and not Trait IAmPope > 0
          and not Trait Sauron > 0

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 100000
          and not Trait Aragorn > 0
          and not Trait Gandalf > 0
          and not Trait Legolas > 0
          and not Trait Aragorn2 > 0
          and not Trait Elessar > 0
          and not Trait Faramir > 0
          and not Trait Thengel > 0
          and not Trait Theoden > 0
          and not Trait Witchking > 0
          and not Trait Nazgul > 0
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not Trait Ugluk > 0
          and not Trait Sauron > 0

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 150000
          and not Trait Gandalf > 0
          and not Trait Legolas > 0
          and not Trait Aragorn2 > 0
          and not Trait Elessar > 0
          and not Trait Thengel > 0
          and not Trait Theoden > 0
          and not Trait Witchking > 0
          and not Trait Nazgul > 0
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not Trait Ugluk > 0
          and not Trait Sauron > 0

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  7 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir_TO
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition CultureType eastern_european

    Affects FactionheirTO  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_TO
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition CultureType eastern_european

    Affects FactionleaderTO  1  Chance  100 
    Affects FactionheirTO -1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition not CultureType eastern_european

    Affects Factionleader  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_pope
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType papal_states

    Affects IAmPope  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
;Trigger reinherited
;    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
;
;    Condition Trait Exheir = 1
;
;    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 
;
;------------------------------------------
;Trigger disinherited
;    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
;
;    Condition not Trait Exheir = 1
;          and not IsFactionLeader
;
;    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100 
;
;------------------------------------------
;Trigger inherited
;    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
;
;    Condition IsFactionLeader
;
;    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100 
;
;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition not CultureType eastern_european

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check_bad_odds_penalty
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= average
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 0.5

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check2_good_odds_bonus
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 1.5

    Affects ContentGeneral  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionExcommunicated
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Piety > 5

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and not GovernorBuildingExists >= stone_wall
          and not GovernorBuildingExists >= castle
          and Attribute Command > 4
          and DistanceCapital > 50

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= large_stone_wall
          and Attribute Command < 10

    Affects ContentGeneral  1  Chance  10 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check7
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= fortress
          and Attribute Command < 10

    Affects ContentGeneral  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check8
    WhenToTest GeneralPrisonersRansomedCaptor

    Condition RansomType execute
          and NumCapturedSoldiers > 80
          and Attribute Chivalry >= 4

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check8_extermination
    WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation

    Condition Attribute Chivalry >= 4

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check9
    WhenToTest BrotherAdopted

    Condition not IsFactionHeir

    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger loyalty_check10_mutually_chivalrous
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Chivalry >= 3
          and FactionLeaderAttribute Chivalry >= 3

    Affects ContentGeneral  1  Chance  10 


;##############################################
;###############  New Triggers  ###############
;##############################################
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Add
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and IsGeneral
        and Trait Ai_Boost < 1

    Affects Ai_Boost 1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_Boost_Remove
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait Ai_Boost >= 1

    Affects Ai_Boost -1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ai_spy_Boost_Add
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not FactionIsLocal
	and AgentType = spy
        and Trait Ai_spy_Boost < 1

    Affects Ai_spy_Boost 1  Chance  100 

;=============  End of Ai_Boost TRIGGERS  ============ 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_AI_birth1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition IsGeneral
          and IsFactionAIControlled

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  33 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  25 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  50 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Scout  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Worthy_Of_Adoption_5_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType eastern_european

    Affects NightBattleCapable  1  Chance  80

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Worth_of_Adoption_aifactions
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType eastern_european
          and IsFactionAIControlled

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  33 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  25 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  50 

;##############################################
;###############  Events  ###############
;##############################################
;------------ Aragorn Event ------------------
Trigger aragorn_accepted
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
	and CharFactionType sicily
	and not FactionLeaderTrait Elessar >= 1
	and I_EventCounter aragorn_accepted > 0

    Affects BadAdministrator  1  Chance  50
    Affects NonAuthoritarian  2  Chance  100
    Affects Noauthority  1  Chance  100
    Affects Unjust  1  Chance  50
    Affects DiscontentGeneral  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger aragorn_refused
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsFactionLeader
	and CharFactionType sicily
	and I_EventCounter aragorn_declined > 0

    Affects ContentGeneral  2  Chance  100
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  100
    Affects Authoritarian  2  Chance  100

;##############################################
;################  Autonomy  ##################
;##############################################

;------------------------------------------
Trigger G5_Hobbit_bonus

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition I_EventCounter Shire_autonomy = 11
    and EndedInSettlement 
    and SettlementName Shire
    and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects G5_Hobbit_bonus  1  Chance  100
  
  
;------------------------------------------
Trigger G5_Hobbit_bonus_2

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition I_EventCounter hobbit_bonus_2 = 20
    and CharacterIsLocal

    Affects G5_Hobbit_bonus_2  1  Chance  100

    
;------------------------------------------
Trigger G5_Autonomy_off

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition I_EventCounter Shire_autonomy != 11
    and CharacterIsLocal
    and Trait G5_Hobbit_bonus > 0
    
    Affects G5_Autonomy_off  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger G5_Hobbit_bonus_2_off

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition I_EventCounter hobbit_bonus_2 = 0
    and CharacterIsLocal
    and Trait G5_Hobbit_bonus_2 > 0
    
    Affects G5_Hobbit_bonus_2_off  1  Chance  100


;##############################################
;###############  Palantiri  ##################
;##############################################

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_will_strength_trigger1
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

  Condition Attribute Command >= 7
    and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength == 0      
    and FactionIsLocal

  Affects Palantir_Will_Strength 1 Chance 50   ;strong_willed

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_will_strength_trigger2
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition FatherTrait Palantir_Will_Strength == 1  ;strong_willed

  Affects Palantir_Will_Strength 1 Chance 33         ;strong_willed

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_will_strength_trigger3
  WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

  Condition FatherTrait Palantir_Will_Strength == 2  ;exceptional_willed

  Affects Palantir_Will_Strength 1 Chance 66         ;strong_willed
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_will_strength_trigger4
  WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

  Condition Attribute Command >= 9
    and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength < 2
    and FactionIsLocal

  Affects Palantir_Will_Strength 2 Chance 100    ;exceptional_willed
	
	;NOTE: if was already strong_willed (Palantir_Will_Strength == 1) then will now be Palantir_Will_Strength == 3.
	;This is still exceptional_willed but be careful not to assume exceptional == 2 in condition checks (use will >= 2 instead).

;--------------- Palantir Exhaustion ---------------

;The total exhaustion points must not be more than 3; the removal triggers only handle the case of 1, 2 and 3.
; No Will --> +2
; Some Will --> +1
; < 50 MP --> +1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_trigger1
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength == 0

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion 2 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_trigger2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength > 0

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_trigger3
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
		and HasAncType palantir
		and RemainingMPPercentage < 50

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion 1 Chance 100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_removal_trigger1
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 0
		and Trait Palantir_Exhaustion == 1

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion -1 Chance 100	

	;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_removal_trigger2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 0 
		and Trait Palantir_Exhaustion == 2

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion -2 Chance 100	
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_exhaustion_removal_trigger3
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 0 
		and Trait Palantir_Exhaustion == 3

	Affects Palantir_Exhaustion -3 Chance 100	
	
;--------------- Palantir Mind effects ---------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_effect_no_will_trigger
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	
	;a no-will user of the palantir (except 'sauron') gets bad traits from using it, even if sauron doesn't have the Ithil-stone

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_viewed_this_turn == 1
		and I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength == 0

	Affects Insane 1 Chance 20
	Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 20
	Affects Deranged 1 Chance 20
	Affects Unjust 1 Chance 15
	Affects Ignorance 1 Chance 15
	Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 15
	Affects BadAdministrator 1 Chance 15
	Affects HarshJustice 1 Chance 15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_effect_strong_will_trigger
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	;a strong-will user of the palantir (except 'sauron') gets fewer bad traits from using it, even if sauron doesn't have the Ithil-stone

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_viewed_this_turn == 1
		and I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength == 1

	Affects Anger 1 Chance 8
	Affects BadAdministrator 1 Chance 8
	Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 8
	Affects Deranged 1 Chance 8
	Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 8
	Affects HarshJustice 1 Chance 8

;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_effect_exceptional_will_trigger
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	;an exceptional-will user of the palantir (except 'sauron') gets even fewer bad traits from using it, even if sauron doesn't have the Ithil-stone

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_viewed_this_turn == 1
		and I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength >= 2

	Affects Anger 1 Chance 5
	Affects BadAdministrator 1 Chance 5
	Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 5
	Affects HarshJustice 1 Chance 5		
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_effect_sauron_influence_trigger
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	
	;a no-will user of the palantir gets additional sauron-caused bad traits 

	Condition I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
		and HasAncType palantir
		and Trait Palantir_Will_Strength == 0

	Affects Fearsengland 1 Chance 40
	Affects Insane 1 Chance 40
	Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 20
	Affects Deranged 1 Chance 20
	Affects Unjust 1 Chance 15
	Affects Ignorance 1 Chance 15
	Affects Hypochondriac 1 Chance 15
	Affects BadAdministrator 1 Chance 15
	Affects HarshJustice 1 Chance 15

;####################### Ringbearer traits (2) ########################
;####RingCorruption1
Trigger Ring_LaxPersonalSecurity1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects LaxPersonalSecurity 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Trusting1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Trusting 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Paranoia1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Paranoia 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_DeceiverVirtue1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects DeceiverVirtue 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Corrupt1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Corrupt 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Disloyal1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Disloyal 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Unjust1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Unjust 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger Ring_DiscontentGeneral1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects DiscontentGeneral 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------	
Trigger Ring_Feck1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait RingCorruption1 >= 1

    Affects Feck 1 Chance 5

;---------------------------------------------------------------

;##############################################
;##############  G5 Missions  #################
;##############################################

Trigger g5mission1
    WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

    Condition PaybackID crusade_1a_reward

    Affects PopesEnforcer  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger g5mission2
    WhenToTest LeaderMissionFailed

    Condition PaybackID crusade_1a_reward

    Affects PopesEnforcer  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger g5mission3
    WhenToTest LeaderMissionSuccess

    Condition PaybackID crusade_1b_reward

    Affects AdoredByPope  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger g5mission4
    WhenToTest LeaderMissionFailed

    Condition PaybackID crusade_1b_reward

    Affects AdoredByPope  -1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_militaryacademy_dalsi_bonusy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= military_academy

    Affects AcademyTrained 1  Chance  2
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodCommander 1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodAttacker 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodAmbusher 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  1
    Affects Brave 1  Chance  2 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_militaryacademy_dalsi_bonusy2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= military_academy

    Affects GoodEngineer 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyAttacker 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Intelligent 1  Chance  1 
    Affects BattleChivalry 1  Chance  3 
    Affects Gregarious 1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_officersacademy_dalsi_bonusy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= officers_academy 

    Affects AcademyTrained 1  Chance  10
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodCommander 1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodAttacker 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodAmbusher 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  1
    Affects Brave 1  Chance  2 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_officersacademy_dalsi_bonusy2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= officers_academy 

    Affects GoodEngineer 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyAttacker 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Intelligent 1  Chance  1 
    Affects BattleChivalry 1  Chance  6 
    Affects Gregarious 1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_militaryacademy_dalsi_bonusy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_military_academy 

    Affects AcademyTrained 1  Chance  10
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodCommander 1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodAttacker 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodAmbusher 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  1
    Affects Brave 1  Chance  2 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_militaryacademy_dalsi_bonusy2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_military_academy 

    Affects GoodEngineer 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyAttacker 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Intelligent 1  Chance  1 
    Affects BattleChivalry 1  Chance  3 
    Affects Gregarious 1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_officersacademy_dalsi_bonusy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_officers_academy 

    Affects AcademyTrained 1  Chance  10
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodCommander 1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodAttacker 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodAmbusher 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  1
    Affects Brave 1  Chance  2 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_officersacademy_dalsi_bonusy2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_officers_academy 

    Affects GoodEngineer 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyAttacker 1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic 1  Chance  1 
    Affects Intelligent 1  Chance  1 
    Affects BattleChivalry 1  Chance  6 
    Affects Gregarious 1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 


;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_barracks_dalsi_bonusy1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_watch 

    Affects GoodCommander 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral 1  Chance  1

          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= greek_flora 

    Affects TrainAdmin  1  Chance  20 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  2
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  2  


;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= m_greek_flora

    Affects TrainAdmin  1  Chance  20 
    Affects GoodDefender 1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  5
    Affects GoodRiskyDefender 1  Chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger more_dread_for_evil_generals_by_their_command
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Attribute Command >= 1
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not FactionType sicily
          and not FactionType milan
          and not FactionType moors
          and not FactionType scotland
          and not FactionType turks
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not FactionType mongols

    Affects StrategyDread  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Unjust 1 Chance 1
    Affects Feck  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger more_dread_for_evil_generals_by_their_command
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Attribute Command >= 2
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not FactionType sicily
          and not FactionType milan
          and not FactionType moors
          and not FactionType scotland
          and not FactionType turks
          and not FactionType egypt
          and not FactionType mongols

    Affects StrategyDread  1  Chance  2
    Affects Unjust 1 Chance 1
    Affects HarshJustice  1  Chance  1  
    Affects Feck  1  Chance  1   

;------------------------------------------

    Condition Attribute Command >= 3
          and not Trait Saruman > 0
          and not FactionType sicily
          and not FactionType milan
          and not FactionType moors

          and not FactionType turks

          and not FactionType mongols

    Affects StrategyDread  1  Chance  3
    Affects HarshRuler  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Unjust 1 Chance 1

          and EndedInSettlement

    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Authoritarian  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  1 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  1
    Affects GoodTaxman  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  1

    Affects StrategyChivalry  1  Chance  3
